code: import{applyMiddleware,createStore}from'redux';import sagaMiddlewareFactory from'redux-saga';import reduxMiddleware from'react-block-ui/lib/reduxMiddleware';import{appReducer}from'./reducers';import sagas from'./sagas';var sagaMiddleware=sagaMiddlewareFactory();var store=createStore(appReducer,applyMiddleware(sagaMiddleware,reduxMiddleware));sagaMiddleware.run(sagas);export default store;
